column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The best steak I've ever eaten in my life is here. And I've eaten at many a Michelin Star restaurant and upscale steakhouse. I only had the petit filet mignon because I can't finish bigger cuts
column2: and it was perfection. It was sooo tender with a perfect seared crust that adds texture to an already perfect piece of meat. I would eat here all the time I lived in Chicago. They make an excellent old fashioned here and have a good whiskey list. I had the baked goat cheese which was just ok
column3: and the mashed potatoes are also just ok. But you're not coming here for anything but that piece of meat
